briefTitle: Personalized Evidence-based Treatment in Patients With Invasive Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Personalized Evidence-based Treatment Improves Survival in Patients With Invasive Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The percentage of guideline-consistent and personalized EBM recommendations
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

All women with stage I-III disease who survived at least 12 months post-diagnosis

Exclusion Criteria:

Unknown cause of death Treatment outside the region (thus precluding the treatment assessment)
